text: 5:8 Aisaia 59:17; Efesus 6:13-17Ezɨ e aruemɨn adarasi, kamaghɨn e deraghvɨra nɨghnɨgham. E nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir arazim ko igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim inigham, egh bizir kamning mɨdorozir korotiamɨn mɨn uan evariba ikeghtɨ da e apazagham. Egh God mɨzuam ikɨ an akurvazir arazim inigham, egh e mɨdorozir dapanir asuamɨn mɨn anerughtɨ an e apazagham.
